name: Fate/kyrie eleison
description:
Fate/Kyrie Eleison This is a Fate/stay night fan game, inspired by the scene in UBW anime where Kirei fights Caster's skeletons.

The game is still in Beta, expect some updates in the coming weeks (fixing bugs + adding features)

Controls ActionKeyboardControllerMoveWASD / Arrow KeysLeft StickAttackJXRollSpaceA / BParryCTRL / KLB / YRunShiftLeft Stick Button / RBPausePMenu

You can attack after a "Parry" to do a "Strong Attack".
